p: The PGPRs ( Azotobacter vinelandii and Azospirillum brasilense) were applied as seed inoculation at the rate of 10 6 bacterial cells/seed. To prepare inoculum, 100 mL of Luria Bertani media (LB) was inoculated with the cultures of Azospirillum brasilense and Azotobacter vinelandii (24 h old) and kept on shaker (Excella E24, USA) at 120 rpm for 72 h at 24Â°C. The centrifugation of bacterial cultures was carried out at 10,000 rpm for 10 minutes. The pellet was suspended in distilled autoclaved water; optical density to be one was adjusted to 600 nm. The sterilized seeds were then soaked in the bacterial cultures for six hours before sowing.
